constituent: drought, mist, ten, needle, early, sun, day, beg, reclining, lying down, fishhook, ten2, needle2
kunYomi: かわ.く、かわ.かす、ほ.す、ひ.る、いぬい
myStory: chữ Kiền. hạn hán, khô, cạn. cầu xin sáng sớm cho nước. sáng + khất.
readingExamples: 乾かす (かわ.かす), 乾く (かわ.く)
words:
乾(かん): heaven, emperor
乾(ほし): dried, cured
乾かす(かわかす): to dry
乾燥(かんそう): dry, arid, dehydrated, insipid
乾電池(かんでんち): dry cell, battery
乾杯(かんぱい): toast (drink)
乾く(かわく): get dry
